Neutešnog Sona jedva smirili igrači oba tima, Poketino se žali na VAR, Dele Ali nije smeo da gleda
Reakcije sa Ostrva posle užasne povrede Andrea Gomeša

03 Nov 2019

O fudbalu niko ne priča. Razumljivo. Posle svega što se desilo u završnici susreta Everton – Totenhem (1:1) svi akteri nedeljnog derbija Premijer lige okrenuti su Andreu Gomešu i saosećaju sa Portugalcem, koji je slomio nogu posle startova Hjong Min Sona i Serža Orijea.
Vrti glavom i Maursio Poketino.„Izuzetno nam je žao svega što se desilo. Stvarno je bilo loše. Želimo sve najbolje Andreu Gomešu. U ovom trenutku fudbal je nebitan, važno je samo da Gomešu bude dobro. Kad se povredio istog časa se promenio osećaj svima na stadionu, teško je bilo ispratiti poslednjih 10, 12 minuta meča“, rekao je Argentinac.
U 79. minutu nekadašnjeg igrača Valensije i Barselone najpre je potkačio Son, što je bilo dovoljno sudiji Martinu Etkinsonu, da polse konsultacija sa VAR-om pokaže reprezentativcu Južne Koreje direktan crveni karton.„Igrači Everotna postupili su fantastično, došli su u našu svlačionicu i tešili Sona. U ime kluba želim da iskažem zahvalnost kapitenu domaćeg tima, Šejmusu Kolmenu, kao i ostalima koji su u podržali Sona. Jedino smatram da nije zaslužiio crveni karton. Namera da povredi igrača nije postojala, niti je hteo da proizvede situaciju koja se desila kasnije (start Orijea, op. au). VAR je trebalo da proveri odluku sudije, jer je i uveden zbog ovakvih situacija. Imaju arbitri ekran pored terena, zašto onda ne bi pogledali“, zapitao se trener Mamuza.



Jednako potresna izgledu noge Andrea Gomeša bila je reakcija Sona, koji je rastrojen trčao terenom, a nije mogao da se smiri ni u svlačionici.„Baš nam je žao. Gomšu možemo samo da pošaljemo želje za što bržim ozdravljenjem. Cela ekipa Totenhema je užasnuta, potrešeni smo. Son posebno. Dečko je bio zbunjen, jedva smo ga smirili. Sigurno nije imao nameru“, dodao je Poketino.
Strelac vodećeg gola za goste iz Londona, Dele Ali, takođe je užasnut.„Nisam smeo da gledam. Son je plakao, bio je razoren, dugo je bio u suzama posle meča, ali sigurno nije kriv. Jedva da je uspeo da digne glavu u svlačionici“, rekao je reprezentativac Engeske.
Šef strulnog štaba Evertona, Marko Silva uverava da je scena povrede njegovog igrača bila teška za gledanje.„Video sam izbliza šta se desilo i 100 odsto sam siguran da Son nije želeo ništa loše da se desi. Andre Gomeš će od svih ljudi u klubu imati maksimalnu podršku. Siguran sam da će, kad se ovo završi, očvrsnuti i kao igrač i kao čovek“, dodao je Portugalac.

Uncomfortable Son was hardly calmed by players from both teams, Poketino complains about VAR, Dele Ali was not allowed to watch
Reactions from the Island after the horrific injury to Andre Gomes

03 Nov 2019

Nobody talks about football. Understandable. After everything that happened in the finals of the Everton - Tottenham (1: 1) match, all players of the Premier League weekly derby turned to Andre Gomes and sympathize with the Portuguese, who broke his leg after the start of Hyong Min Son and Serje Ori.
Maursio Poketino shakes his head. "We are extremely sorry for all that has happened. It was really bad. We wish all the best to Andre Gomes. Football is irrelevant at this point, it is only important that Gomes is well. When everyone was injured at the same moment, the feeling of everyone in the stadium changed, it was difficult to follow the last 10, 12 minutes of the match, "said the Argentine.
In the 79th minute, the former Valencia and Barcelona player first instigated Son, which was enough for referee Martin Etkinson to give the South Korean national team a red card in a half consultation. "The players of Evrotna did fantastic, came to our locker room and comforted Sona. On behalf of the club, I would like to express my gratitude to the captain of the home team, Seamus Coleman, as well as the others who supported Sona. Only I don't think he deserves a red card. The intention to injure the player did not exist, nor did he want to produce a situation that happened later (Ori's start, op. Au). The VAR should have reviewed the judge's decision because it was introduced because of these situations. The arbitrators have a screen next to the court, so why not look, "Coach Mamuza wondered.



Equally poignant with the look of Andre Gomes' leg was the reaction of Son, who was distracted by the running of the pitch and couldn't even calm himself in the locker room. "We're sorry. We can only send Gomasha a wish for healing as soon as possible. The whole Tottenham team is horrified, we're dismayed. Son in particular. The boy was confused, we could hardly calm him down. He certainly had no intention, "Poketino added.
Dele Ali's leading scorer for visiting guests from London is also horrified. "I shouldn't have watched. Son cried, was devastated, long in tears after the match, but certainly not guilty. He barely managed to get his head in the locker room, "said an Englishman.
Everton's Chief of Staff, Marco Silva, assures that his player's injury scene was difficult to watch. "I saw a close up of what happened and I'm 100 percent sure Son didn't want anything bad to happen. Andre Gomes will have maximum support from all the people in the club. I am sure that when this is over, it will solidify both as a player and as a human being, ”added the Portuguese.
